title: TorontoJS Presents: IWD2022 with Women Techmakers Ambassadors - Day 1
details:
Details
-------

Women Tachmakers (WTM) Ambassadors are collaborating with TorontoJS to bring to you a 3-day International Women's Day (IWD) event on Youtube Live. This year's running theme from WTM is #ProgressNotPerfection to enhance IWD 2022 campaign theme #BreakTheBias. WTM Ambassador with TorontoJS, Sherry Yang and WTM Ambassador Argentina, Giuliana Polsoni will be live for 90 minutes discussing different topics each day. Stay tuned for what's coming to your screens on March 29th to March 31st!

**DAY 1**  
March 29th, 2022  
1pm EDT / 5pm UTC  
Women in tech around the world
